text: Keini in-orna ajar hichu, hiwa eini nuoipilchung ringkhuo-ah incheenna nangnile niomna suungnga hin omchan katuun li malung inthiang tak-ah Pathian nape wairoonna nuoiya omchan hi kinjui, hiwahi miring ngai singna khan eleiya, Pathian riangwai ranak khanna kintho eii tihi akase akatha jetnakhan namincheen eii.
